Name: Fly
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: 'Thunder', 'Twister', 'Sky Uppercut', 'Gust', 'Hurricane', 'Smack Down'. Out of battle allows the pokemon to fly long distances.
Description: The user flies up high in one action, then drops and strikes in the next one. The Pok√©mon can fly for extremely long periods of time without getting tired.
